title: Can't run tests

body:
Hi @yieniggu, this runtime error `VM Exception while processing transaction: revert ERC721Enumerable: owner index out of bounds` points to this being an issue with your code or tests rather than an issue with Truffle. You can use [Truffle's debugger](https://www.trufflesuite.com/docs/truffle/getting-started/debugging-your-contracts) to step through the failing transaction.

If you think this is in fact a Truffle issue, please provide details on how to reproduce and we'll look into it.

This in fact happens to me when upgrading Truffle from 5.1.26 to 5.4.18/19. 

Edit: Changes from 5.3.7 to 5.3.8 broke the tests for me. Mocha throws uncaught error even if I wrap the MyContract.new() with try...catch. Until 5.3.7 try...catch caught the error properly.
OK, we're going to close this for issue maintenance.  @yienniggu, feel free to let us know if there's still a problem here.  Thanks!
@shahafn That sounds like an unrelated issue.  Would you mind opening a new issue for that with more detailed reproduction steps?  Thank you!
